data.event: Lexington post office was established in 1885.

event.title: 1886, shortly after Morrow County was created

data.event: In 1886, shortly after Morrow County was created, Lexington lost by 33 votes to Heppner in an election to determine the county seat.
The city was incorporated in 1903, and had a population of 185 at the 1910 census.
